/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with a variety of shops and restaurants, their facades adorned with colorful signs and awnings that add a vibrant touch to the scene. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. Trees and buildings flank the street, framing the scene and adding depth to the image. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a warm and sunny day.
